Posts.Content: Jul 8, 2014 01:03PM ells37 wrote: Marie June, I'm so sorry for all you've been through, I imagine the stress and worry is awful.  Hopefully one of the knowledgeable veterans of this board will be along to answer your questions.  I just wanted to share with you that I did have an excisional biopsy years ago that resulted in similar path results to your.  One segment was "yellow/tan" the other was "pink/tan", both were fibrous and both were completely benign.  I hope for the same result for you.
Posts.Title: PASH diagnosis with CANCER symptoms?! CONFUSED. MarieJune MarieJune
